zones.label: Bazaar Main — BZ-M1
zones.notes: Wide bazaar segment. Stall strips on edges only.

zones.label: Bazaar Main — BZ-M2 (JOG)
zones.notes: Jog segment offsets lane center +2.0m East to break long LoS.

zones.label: Bazaar Main — BZ-M3
zones.notes: North bazaar segment leading to hero arch + gate plaza.

zones.label: Clear Travel Zone — M1
zones.notes: NO props/shops.

zones.label: Clear Travel Zone — M2
zones.notes: NO props/shops.

zones.label: Clear Travel Zone — M3
zones.notes: NO props/shops.

zones.label: Spawn B ↔ East Hall Connector
zones.notes: Short connector; maintain quick flank access.

zones.label: Spawn B ↔ West Hall Connector
zones.notes: Short connector; maintain quick flank access.

zones.label: Spawn A ↔ East Hall Connector
zones.notes: Short connector; maintain quick flank access.

zones.label: Spawn A ↔ West Hall Connector
zones.notes: Short connector; maintain quick flank access.

zones.label: Mid Cut (East)
zones.notes: Rotation between east hall and main lane.

zones.label: North Cut (East)
zones.notes: Rotation between east hall and main lane.

zones.label: Mid Cut (West)
zones.notes: Rotation between west hall and main lane.

zones.label: North Cut (West)
zones.notes: Rotation between west hall and main lane.

zones.label: East Side Hall
zones.notes: Narrow service alley flank lane; use prop pockets on corners; keep ~3.0m clear.

zones.label: West Side Hall
zones.notes: Narrow service alley flank lane; use prop pockets on corners; keep ~3.0m clear.

zones.label: Spawn A — Courtyard
zones.notes: Spawn safety cover + quick access to all lanes via bazaar center and side connectors.

zones.label: Spawn B — Gate Plaza
zones.notes: Spawn safety cover + landmark arch threshold into bazaar.

zones.label: Stall Strip M1 (L)
zones.notes: Edge-only decor + stalls; never intrude into CLEAR_M1.

zones.label: Stall Strip M1 (R)
zones.notes: Edge-only decor + stalls; never intrude into CLEAR_M1.
